name: Disable WP Plugin Updates Advance
author: Nilay Patel

sections.description:
This plugin is use to disable all your plugin updates as well as notifications for the same. It will prevent your wordpress to check for new updates. This plugin is ideal for whom who have customzied the plugins and won’t loose their customization at thime of update.

Read This First:
You need to keep your WordPress updated with themes and plugins so if you fail for the same then it will might increase security issues.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the zip file into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. On activation it will hide all the plugin updates
sections.faq: If you have any question do let me know on gr8nilay@gmail.com
